info.narration: #0 is on their way to $0’s Containment Unit to begin the work process.

collection.name: Der Freischütz
collection.openText: "This magical bullet can truly hit anyone, just like you say."

specialTipSize.specialTip: Requesting aid from $0 is permitted. $0 agreed to perform the request at the expense of 10% of our current energy.
However, the bullets that $0 fires can penetrate and damage anything. Furthermore, $0’s 7th bullet will not fire where you desire, so you must plan ahead wisely.
The Qliphoth Counter lowered when #0, whose Justice was lower than Level 3, completed work with $0.
When the work result was Normal, the Qliphoth Counter lowered with a normal probability.
When the work result was Bad, the Qliphoth Counter lowered with a high probability.
When the Qliphoth Counter hit 0, $0 willfully fired a bullet towards a random location.
